title: Port already in use
explanation: Another process is already listening on that port, so the app cannot bind to it.
causes: A previous server instance is still running
Another application is using the same port
fixes: Kill the PID with kill PID

title: Permission denied
explanation: The current user does not have enough permissions for that action, path, or port.
causes: File or directory permissions are too restrictive
Trying to bind to a privileged port (<1024)
fixes: Adjust permissions or ownership if appropriate

title: File or path not found
explanation: The system cannot find the file, directory, or command being referenced.
causes: Command is not available in PATH
fixes: List the directory contents with ls
Check PATH or install the missing command

title: Connection refused
explanation: A connection was attempted, but no service was listening on the target host and port.

title: Module not found
explanation: Node cannot resolve the module in an import or require statement.
